mapper.insert: insert into trade_order (order_id, user_id, order_status, pay_status, shipping_status, addres, consignee, goods_id, goods_number, goods_price, goods_amount, shipping_fee, order_amoumt, coupon_id, coupon_paid, money_paid, pay_amount, add_time, confirm_tmie, pay_time) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{shippingStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{addres,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shippingFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderAmoumt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{couponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moneyPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{confirmTmie,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update trade_order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, shipping_status = #{shippingStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, addres = #{addres,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_number = #{goodsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, goods_amount = #{goodsAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shipping_fee = #{shippingFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_amoumt = #{orderAmoumt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_paid = #{couponPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, money_paid = #{moneyPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_amount = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, confirm_tmie = #{confirmTmie,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select order_id, user_id, order_status, pay_status, shipping_status, addres, consignee, goods_id, goods_number, goods_price, goods_amount, shipping_fee, order_amoumt, coupon_id, coupon_paid, money_paid, pay_amount, add_time, confirm_tmie, pay_time from trade_order where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select order_id, user_id, order_status, pay_status, shipping_status, addres, consignee, goods_id, goods_number, goods_price, goods_amount, shipping_fee, order_amoumt, coupon_id, coupon_paid, money_paid, pay_amount, add_time, confirm_tmie, pay_time from trade_order
